nodes.body: The ablative case is traditionally referred to as འབྱུང་ཁུངས་ཀྱི་སྒྲ་, literally “sound of the source.” The invariable case-particle ནས་ indicates spatial or temporal provenance (“from”); marks the agent of an action; marks causal or temporal subordinate clauses; and may be used in the composition of postpositions and adverbs.
